description: The trap is generated when a SIP gateway fails to register.

event.Summary: SIP ($v4) gateway failed to register due to $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPRegisterFailure HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPServerIPAddress a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPServerPort i 9999 HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPRegisterFailReason s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPID s EXAMPLE

description: The IP address of a SIP server.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPServerIPAddress

description: The port of a SIP server. By default, the object value is 5060.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPServerPort

description: The object describes the reason that a SIP gateway fails to register.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPRegisterFailReason

description: The unique identification of a SIP gateway. By default,
this object should have the value 'VRP-GATEWAY'.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPID

description: The trap is generated when a requests with its credential fail to authenticate.
The unique identification of a SIP gateway. By default,
this object should have the value 'VRP-GATEWAY'.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPID

description: The object denotes the methord of a request that fails to authenticate.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SIP-MIB::hwSIPAuthenticatedRequestMethord

description: The trap is generated when a switch happens between master and slaver SIP server.
